name: Santa vs Krampus: Kitchen Nightmares
description:
Santa vs Krampus : Kitchen Nightmares

Santa and Krampus go head to head in the kitchen in this two-player local multiplayer game, 

The game was created over the course of three hours as part of the Solent Winter Micro Jam.

How to Play

Both players need to race to be the one to deliver the desired item, the one who delivers the most correct items in 90 seconds wins.

Controls

Player 1

Movement - W/A/S/D

Grabbing - F

Player 2

Movement - Arrow Keys

Grabbing - Right Control

General

Selection (Menu) - Enter / A on Controller
